price: 69. Y le dijimos al fuego: “Sé frío y no quemes a Abraham”.
arabic: قُلۡنَا يَٰنَارُ كُونِي بَرۡدٗا وَسَلَٰمًا عَلَىٰٓ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: qul'nā yānāru kūnī bardan wasalāman ʿalā ib'rāhīma
